member.name: T:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket
member.summary: Provides a client for connecting to WebSocket services.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.Abort
member.summary: Aborts the connection and cancels any pending IO operations.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.CloseAsync(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Close the instance as an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The WebSocket close status.
A description of the close status.
A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.
member.returns: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.CloseOutputAsync(System.Net.WebSockets.WebSocketCloseStatus,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Close the output for the instance as an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The WebSocket close status.
A description of the close status.
A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.
member.returns: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.CloseStatus
member.summary: Gets the reason why the close handshake was initiated on instance.
member.returns: The reason why the close handshake was initiated.

member.name: P:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.CloseStatusDescription
member.summary: Gets a description of the reason why the instance was closed.
member.returns: The description of the reason why the instance was closed.

member.name: M:System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket.ConnectAsync(System.Uri,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Connect to a WebSocket server as an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The URI of the WebSocket server to connect to.
A cancellation token used to propagate notification that the operation should be canceled.
member.returns: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Receives data on as an asynchronous operation.

member.summary: Sends data on as an asynchronous operation.
member.param: The buffer containing the message to be sent.
One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the buffer is clear text or in a binary format.
to indicate this is the final asynchronous send; otherwise, .
A cancellation token used to propagate notification that this operation should be canceled.
member.returns: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.

One of the enumeration values that specifies whether the buffer is clear text or in a binary format.
to indicate this is the final asynchronous send; otherwise, .

member.returns: if default credentials should be used during WebSocket handshake; otherwise, . The default is .
